name.description: Name the damage source should have to pass the check. See [List of Damage Source Names](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/damage_condition_types/name) for possible values.
name.markdownDescription: Name the damage source should have to pass the check. See [List of Damage Source Names](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/damage_condition_types/name) for possible values.

type.description:
[Damage Condition Type](../damage_condition_types.md)

Checks whether the damage source has a specific name (essentially checking the type of damage).

Type ID: `origins:name`

[Damage Condition Type](../damage_condition_types.md)

Type ID: `origins:name`
